CustomField.description: Do not share items in the BOM of these categories. Enter a comma-separated list of category names. Used in conjunction with Share BOM and Only share one level of BOM.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do not share items in the BOM of these categories. Enter a comma-separated list of category names. Used in conjunction with Share BOM and Only share one level of BOM.
CustomField.label: Category Exceptions
